title: ALP WebDev
description: ALP project for subject Web Development in Semester 4 that was created to support my family business in Balikpapan

title: EduLiving
description: We created a website to supports Kebun Binatang Surabaya by creating a game-quiz that will get you new animal stored in your collection if you win

title: GreenThumb
description: This is an ongoing project for ALP in Mobile Application Development subject which we build a swift-based app to support green-lifestyle

title: DigPro
description: We build a well designed content creator website that supports UMKM or other business in Indonesia

title: De Sauge
description: Although without database,i made a website from templates downloaded from envato and manage to make it work as an actual website for my client

title: BikeFlow
description: Developed a time series AI model to predict daily bike usage based on environmental factors. Led AI development, backend, and frontend integration in a three-member team.

title: YuccaGPT
description: Developed an AI-powered text-to-speech system for Universitas Ciputra Surabaya using Python and Google Cloud. Handled backend, frontend, and AI integration.
